title: 05: Tiny Habits and Behavioral Change
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description:
In this first episode of the second season the podcast crew discuss Tiny habits by DR BJ Fogg and how they can be used to change behavior in a manner more conducive to our lifestyles and how they relate back to behavioral economics.
Tweet us @MadHatEconomics
Email us madhatecon@gmail.com
